messages.content: Whats the country with most pyramids

It is difficult to determine which country has the most pyramids, as there have been many people and cultures that have builtPyramids over the centuries. Some of the most well-knownPyramids in the world include the Great Pyramid of Gizeh in Egypt, the Cerne IIIPyramid in Java, and the recently discovered Giza Pyramids in Egypt. However, it is important to note that the number ofPyramids built by a particular culture or society can vary greatly, and there may be many morePyramids that have not been discovered or studied yet.
